alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 1:45PM CDT until June 04 at 5:04AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Walnut River at Winfield. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of the campgrounds and fairgrounds can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 5.2 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Walnut River Winfield 18.0 18.6 Fri 1 pm CDT 13.7 10.3 7.8 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
